General.Name: Verkkokauppa.com Oyj
General.Description: Verkkokauppa.com Oyj operates as an online retailer in Finland. The company also operates retail stores in Oulu, Pirkkala, Raisio, and Helsinki. It offers information technology, entertainment electronics, toys, games, sports, pet, and childcare products. In addition, it provides installation, and maintenance services, and subscription services. Verkkokauppa.com Oyj was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

4.Name: Marja  Makinen
4.Title: Head of Investor Relations & Corp. communications
